product_description: Benefiber On the Go Prebiotic Fiber Supplement Powder is a gluten free and sugar free supplement that helps you maintain good digestive health. Made with wheat dextrin, this dietary fiber powder nourishes the growth of good bacteria that exist in your gut (1). Benefiber On The Go stick packs are daily fiber powder supplements that come in conveniently pre-measured, single-serving unflavored fiber packets of powder, making it easy to add fiber to your diet wherever you go. For ages 12 and older, mix the contents of a prebiotic powder stick pack into a non-carbonated beverage or soft food and stir well until fully dissolved, up to three times daily. short_description: DIGESTIVE SUPPORT: Take good care of your digestive health with Bio.me Daily Prebiotic Fiber supplement. This fiber powder combines two clinically-researched prebiotics, delivering 7g of soluble fiber per serving to support a balanced microbiome without causing bloating, gas, or cramping. This fiber supplement powder is perfect for both men and women and ensures gentle, effective relief when used daily.

BETTER GUT HEALTH: Bio.me's fiber powder is a unique blend of plant-derived resistant potato starch and hydrolyzed guar gum (PHGG), specifically formulated to boost your gut health. These prebiotics help promote the growth of beneficial bacteria, improve nutrient absorption, and support a healthy gut lining. Ideal as a daily use fiber supplement for women and men, it’s your partner in achieving optimal digestive wellness.

BLOATING RELIEF: No more stomach discomfort with our unflavored prebiotic fiber powder. This soluble fiber supplement is designed to ease bloating and promote regularity. Its slow-fermenting fibers gently nourish your gut bacteria, enhancing digestion without the unpleasant side effects of bloating or cramping, making it a superior choice among fiber supplements.

VERSATILE AND CONVENIENT: Incorporating fiber into your diet has never been easier. Bio.me's prebiotic fiber powder unflavored is incredibly versatile, seamlessly mixing into warm and cold beverages, smoothies, and various foods. This tasteless dietary fiber supplement is perfect for daily use, making sure you get the digestive health support you need effortlessly.

CLEAN & CERTIFIED GLYPHOSATE RESIDUE FREE: Committed to quality, Bio.me Daily Prebiotic Fiber is certified Glyphosate Residue Free, non-GMO, dairy free, gluten free, and vegan. This dietary fiber supplement is also low FODMAP certified, making it a safe and healthy choice for everyone seeking to making their digestive health better with integrity and reliability.
